m_szDocTitle: Patent US8557442 - Nanocomposite of graphene and metal oxide materials - Google Patents
m_szDocSumamry: Nanocomposite of graphene and metal oxide materials US 8557442 B2 Abstract Nanocomposite materials comprising a metal oxide bonded to at least one graphene material. The nanocomposite materials exhibit a specific capacity of at least twice that of the metal oxide material without the graphene at a charge/discharge rate greater than about 10 C. Images(13) The invention claimed is: 1. A method comprising: providing graphene layers in a first mixture, the graphene layers having a first surface and a second surface and thicknesses of 0.5 to 50 nm; dispersing the graphene layers with a surfactant;
